fields.headline: In brief
fields.bodyText: Football ban for boy, 15 Dean Bell, 15, from Pelton, County Durham, has been banned from playing football in the street as part of an antisocial behaviour order. Rollercoaster death verdict The death of Gemma Savage, 20, from Wath upon Dearne, South Yorkshire, in a rollercoaster accident at the Lightwater Valley theme park near Ripon was misadventure, an inquest jury decided. Nurse bailed on murder charges Nurse Anne Grigg-Booth, 51, was remanded on bail at Bradford crown court yesterday charged with murdering three patients at Airedale general hospital, West Yorkshire. Life-saving gas for macaw A macaw called Roger was given life-saving oxygen after being rescued with his owner, Mark Cairns, from a burning flat in Edinburgh. Outfoxed A wallaby reported to be on the loose in Cardiff is now thought to be an injured fox.
